revised_title: Elastic Scattering of Electrons by Helium Atoms: Dispersion Relations and Forward Scattering
tldr: This article analyzes the elastic scattering of electrons by helium atoms using dispersion relations for the forward scattering intensity. The results agree well with observed data, exchange-adiabatic calculations, and Born's first approximation. The study provides insights into the behavior of electrons when they collide with helium atoms, contributing to the understanding of atomic physics.
